data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Podunavski be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Podunavski, Serbia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 663 believers in the state of Podunavski to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord we pray you unite the 663 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Podunavski.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 663 believers in Podunavski, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Gorani people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Podunavski.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Podunavski, Serbia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.section_summary:
the state of Podunavski, Serbia has a population of 92,300.

We estimate Podunavski has 663 people who might know Jesus, 72,454 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,183 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 139 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Podunavski.
